a little better prepared to be of
service to my fellow man owing to my
having applied the principle of
performing more work than I was actually
paid to perform it may be of interest to
you to know that the last position I
held in the coal business was that of
assistant to the chief counsel for one
of the largest companies in the world it
is a considerable jump from position of
common laborer in the coal mine to that
of assistant to the chief counsel of one
of the largest companies a jump that I
never could have made without the aid of
this principle of performing more work
than I was paid to perform I wish I had
the space in which to tell you of the
scores of time that this idea of
performing more work than I was paid to

many have been the times that I have
placed in
lawyer so deeply in my debt through the
aid of this principle that I got

without the feeling that I was taking

believe most earnestly that anything a

his hands to say nothing of 9:00 at his
consciousness until his heart aches with

it was the arrogant disregard of this

I haven't very much of it at this

it possible for me to pass on to the

whatever position in life you may make

the time
when he will have some sort of business

you can overcome almost any obstacle

regardless of the amount of money you
